sentences.english: We could go get a bowl of fish balls and wash it down with a sour plum drink.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以去喝一碗鱼丸汤，然后用酸梅汁将它消化掉。

sentences.english: Fish-ball soup is one of my favorite Taiwanese dishes.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的台湾菜之一就是鱼丸汤。

sentences.english: So are the fish and pork balls.
I'll help you with some fish balls.
sentences.chinese: 我只好来帮你搛点鱼丸。

sentences.english: Since you don't help yourself, I'll help you with some fish balls.
sentences.chinese: 既然你不下筷，我只好来帮你搛点鱼丸。

sentences.english: Since you don't help yourself, I'll help you with some  fish balls.
sentences.chinese: 既然你自己不下筷，我只好来帮你搛点鱼丸。

sentences.english: The shelf life of the high pressure treated fish balls was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超高压处理的鱼丸的贮藏稳定性。

sentences.english: I went to the new Fishball museum in Tamsui.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了淡水新开的鱼丸博物馆。

sentences.english: I also bought fishball that looks tempting.
sentences.chinese: 我也买了卖相不错的鱼丸。

sentences.english: Since you don't help yourself, i'll help you with some fish balls.
sentences.chinese: 既然你本身不下筷，我只好来帮你搛点鱼丸。

sentences.english: Shape fish paste into balls. Cook in congee.
sentences.chinese: 鱼胶捏成鱼丸，放滚粥内煮熟。

sentences.english: Let's have some fish ball soup and A-Gei at Tamsui.
sentences.chinese: 我们一起去淡水吃阿给和鱼丸汤。

sentences.english: Add the fish balls into boiling water.
Buy fish balls in the Chinese supermarket.
We knew we had to try out her dishes.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道我们必须试试她的鱼丸。

sentences.english: One of our favourites, a classic fish ball soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们的最爱之一，经典的鱼丸汤。

definition: nian gao, New Year cake, typically a sweet, steamed cake made with glutinous rice flour
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
